{{Infobox battle item |name = Twisted Spoon |image = [[File:Twisted Spoon.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Twisted Spoon''. |location =
*[[Twisted Spoon#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''Twisted Spoon''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to [[File:Psychic_Type_icon.png|30px]] Psychic type Pokémon. == Details == Raises attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 10%. == Acquisition == ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Items}} {{LootItem|Ruins of Alph|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Celestial Tower|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Ruins of Life|Legendary}} |} |} {{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
